text:
e="preserve">Judith Kennedy (October 25, 1944 – April 15, 2018) was an American politician and businesswoman. She was a member of the Democratic Party until 2015. In 2011, Kennedy was elected Mayor of Newburgh, New York, serving in the office until her death in 2018. She was born in Salmon, Idaho. In the 1990s, she worked for Hewlett-Packard.
Kennedy died under hospice care of ovarian cancer on April 15, 2018 in Newburgh at the age of 73.
